other_tests.findings: Rapid detoxification was more difficult than anticipated; complaints of sleeplessness and anxiety lasted for a week.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After 6 days, stable with no detectable opioid withdrawal symptoms, though disrupted sleep continued.

other_tests.findings: No positive illicit drug urine screens.
Mild abdominal cramping and insomnia on the first day, felt better by the second dose. Continued heroin use but discontinued it after 1 week.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Induction did not require detoxification and could be managed with a three-times-a-week dosing schedule after the first week.
